page.title: Kmart Buying Sears in \$11.5 Billion Deal
page.text: NEW YORK (Reuters) - Discount retailer Kmart Holding Corp. <A HREF="http://www.investor.reuters.com/FullQuote.aspx?ticker=KMRT.O target=/stocks/quickinfo/fullquote">KMRT.O</A> will buy department store operator Sears, Roebuck Co. <A HREF="http://www.investor.reuters.com/FullQuote.aspx?ticker=S.N target=/stocks/quickinfo/fullquote">S.N</A> in a \$11.5 billion deal unveiled on Wednesday that will create the third-largest U.S. retailer.
